Class ReviewServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.uninsubria.server_services.ReviewServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReviewService, Serializable, Remote
public class ReviewServiceImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ReviewService
Implementation of the ReviewService interface for managing restaurant reviews. This class provides methods to retrieve, create, update, and delete reviews.
Author:
Lorenzo Radice
See Also:

      public List<ReviewDTO> getReviews(String restaurantId) throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: ReviewService
      Retrieves all reviews for a specific restaurant.
      Specified by:
      getReviews in interface ReviewService
      Parameters:
      restaurantId - The ID of the restaurant
      Returns:
      A list of reviews for the restaurant
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs

    • createOrUpdateReview

      public boolean createOrUpdateReview(ReviewDTO review) throws RemoteException, SecurityException, IllegalArgumentException
      Description copied from interface: ReviewService
      Creates a new review or updates an existing one. A user can only have one review per restaurant, so this method will update an existing review if the user has already reviewed this restaurant.
      Specified by:
      createOrUpdateReview in interface ReviewService
      Parameters:
      review - The review to create or update
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs
      SecurityException - If the user does not have permission to review this restaurant
      IllegalArgumentException - If the review data is invalid

    • deleteReview

      public boolean deleteReview(String username, String restaurantId) throws RemoteException, SecurityException
      Description copied from interface: ReviewService
      Deletes a review. A user can only delete their own reviews.
      Specified by:
      deleteReview in interface ReviewService
      Parameters:
      username - The ID of the user attempting to delete the review
      restaurantId - The ID of the restaurant that was reviewed
      Returns:
      true if the review was successfully deleted, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs
      SecurityException - If the user does not have permission to delete this review

    • getUserReviews

      public List<ReviewDTO> getUserReviews(String username) throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: ReviewService
      Retrieves all reviews created by a specific user.
      Specified by:
      getUserReviews in interface ReviewService
      Parameters:
      username - The ID of the user whose reviews to retrieve
      Returns:
      A list of reviews created by the user
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs
